Attributes.description: Critical examination of the gender dimension of globalization and the theories, discourse, and practices in international politics using gender analysis.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: Either (a) all of GRSJ 101, GRSJ 102 or (b) all of WMST 101, WMST 102. (or third-year standing.)
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 1, Days: Tue Thu, Start Time: 12:30, End Time: 14:00, Building: To, Room: Be
